records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-24893 affects Xwiki by allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted input that exploits improper input validation in the file upload functionality.

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-9242 is a vulnerability in Watchguard Fireware that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to exploit a buffer overflow in the web interface, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution on the affected component.
records.summary_ciso: CVE-2025-9242 poses a critical vulnerability in Watchguard Fireware that could allow attackers to exploit system weaknesses, potentially leading to significant data breaches and operational disruptions, necessitating immediate mitigation to protect our organizational assets.
records.description: CVE-2025-9242 is a vulnerability in Watchguard Fireware that allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to exploit a buffer overflow in the web interface, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution on the affected component.

news_article.title: Researchers Uncover WatchGuard VPN Bug That Could Let Attackers Take Over Devices

records.summary_analyst: CVE-2025-12480 affects Gladinet Triofox by enabling unauthorized remote code execution through an insufficient input validation vulnerability in the file upload functionality.

records.description: CVE-2025-12480 affects Gladinet Triofox by enabling unauthorized remote code execution through an insufficient input validation vulnerability in the file upload functionality.
